name: Topo Stuff
description:
This package contains topography-related nodes. Currently includes: 
* Filter For Topo Subregions, 
* Topo To Mesh, 
* Topo-Plane Intersection.
The custom node Get Topo Points has been removed as there is now a built-in node (Points from Topography) that can do the same.
contents: Filter For Topo Subregions - Filters out everything that is *not* a topo subregion. Needs Revit 2014 or newer to work., Topo To Mesh - Extracts the mesh of a toposurface, Topo-Plane Intersection - Calculates the intersection of a toposurface and a plane
